rows.name: Acid Fog
rows.effect: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
rows.short_description: Billowing acid fog slows sight/movement and deals 2d6 acid damage each round.

rows.name: Acid Splash
rows.short_description: Ranged touch attack; 1d3 acid damage.

rows.name: Aid
rows.target: Living creature touched
rows.short_description: +1 morale on attacks and saves vs. fear; 1d8 + caster level (max +10) temporary hp.

rows.name: Air Walk
rows.target: Creature (Gargantuan or smaller) touched
rows.short_description: Subject walks on air as if solid; can ascend/descend at 45°; winds can push the subject.

rows.name: Alarm
rows.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
rows.short_description: Wards an area; mental ‘ping’ to you or audible bell when creatures enter.

rows.name: Align Weapon
rows.target: Weapon touched or fifty projectiles (all in contact at casting)
rows.short_description: Makes a weapon good/evil/lawful/chaotic to bypass DR; not usable on natural weapons.

rows.name: Alter Self
rows.target: You
rows.short_description: Assume the form of a same-type creature within one size; gain its physical qualities.

rows.name: Analyze Dweomer
rows.target: One object or creature per caster level
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Reveals spells on creatures/objects and magic item functions; attended objects may save.

rows.name: Animal Growth
rows.target: Up to one animal (Gargantuan or smaller) per two levels, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Doubles animals’ size; +8 Str, +4 Con, –2 Dex, +2 natural armor; DR 10/magic; +4 on saves.

rows.name: Animal Messenger
rows.target: One Tiny animal
rows.short_description: Compels a Tiny animal to carry a message to a designated location.

rows.name: Animal Shapes
rows.target: Up to one willing creature per level, all within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Transforms multiple willing creatures into the same animal forms; each can revert individually.

rows.name: Animal Trance
rows.target: Animals or magical beasts with Intelligence 1 or 2
rows.short_description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of low-Int animals or magical beasts with music or chanting.

rows.name: Animate Dead
rows.target: One or more corpses touched
rows.short_description: Creates skeletons or zombies under your control (HD limits; black onyx material).

rows.name: Animate Objects
rows.target: One Small object per caster level; see text
rows.short_description: Animates nonmagical objects (size-based counts) to attack; you can retarget as a move action.

rows.name: Animate Plants
rows.target: One Large plant per three caster levels or all plants within range; see text
rows.short_description: Animates plants as attackers or causes all plants in range to entangle creatures.

rows.name: Animate Rope
rows.target: One ropelike object, length up to 50 ft. + 5 ft./level; see text
rows.short_description: Commands rope to coil, loop, knot, or entangle on a hit; +2 bonus on your Use Rope checks.

rows.name: Antilife Shell
rows.short_description: Mobile field hedges out living creatures except constructs, elementals, outsiders, and undead.

rows.name: Antimagic Field
rows.short_description: Suppresses magic in area; summoned/incorporeal creatures wink out; magic items function as mundane.

rows.name: Antiplant Shell
rows.short_description: Mobile barrier keeps plant creatures and animated plants at bay.

rows.name: Antipathy
rows.target: One location (up to a 10-ft. cube/level) or one object
rows.short_description: Object or area repels a specified creature kind or alignment; failed save forces shunning.

rows.name: Arcane Eye
rows.short_description: Invisible sensor transmits sight; moves 30 ft./round (10 ft. when scanning surfaces).

rows.name: Arcane Lock
rows.target: The door, chest, or portal touched, up to 30 sq. ft./level in size
rows.short_description: Magically locks a portal; +10 to break DC; knock suppresses for 10 minutes; caster can pass freely.

rows.name: Arcane Mark
rows.effect: One personal rune or mark, all of which must fit within 1 sq. ft.
rows.short_description: Inscribes your personal rune (visible or invisible) on any surface without harm.

rows.name: Arcane Sight
rows.target: You
rows.short_description: See locations and strengths of magical auras within 120 ft.; identify schools with Spellcraft.

rows.name: Arcane Sight, Greater
rows.target: You
rows.short_description: As arcane sight, plus you automatically know which spells or magic effects are active on what you see.

rows.name: Astral Projection
rows.target: You plus one additional willing creature touched per two caster levels
rows.short_description: Projects astral bodies linked by silver cords to travel planes; bodies left in suspended animation.

rows.name: Atonement
rows.target: Living creature touched
rows.short_description: Removes burden of misdeeds or restores class/spell powers; deliberate cases cost 500 XP.

rows.name: Augury
rows.target: You
rows.short_description: Predicts weal, woe, both, or nothing for an action within ~30 minutes (70% +1%/level, max 90%).

rows.name: Awaken
rows.target: Animal or tree touched
rows.short_description: Grants animal or tree sentience and speech (friendly to you); XP cost.

rows.name: Baleful Polymorph
rows.target: One creature
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude negates, Will partial; see text
rows.short_description: Transforms target into a Small or smaller 1-HD animal; retains alignment and hp; Will save may retain mind.
